src:
Main Salju Seru Diskon Rp100 Ribu di Trans Studio Cibubur
02 Nov 2019, 10:26 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Puput Tripeni Juniman)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Liburan selalu menjadi momen yang paling ditunggu setiap orang. Bagi yang berada di Jakarta dan tak mau jauh-jauh mengunjungi tempat liburan, kamu bisa datang ke Trans Studio Cibubur. Trans Studio Cibubur (TSC) menghadirkan theme park indoor berkelas internasional yang cocok menjadi destinasi liburan akhir pekan yang masih berada di wilayah Jakarta.Terletak di Jalan Alternatif Cibubur, Harjamukti, Cimanggis, Depok, Trans Studio Cibubur buka setiap hari mulai pukul 09.00-21.00 WIB.Di sini sejumlah wahana dapat dicoba bersama orang-orang tersayang. Ada beberapa wahana yang seru dan menantang, namun ada juga yang bisa dinikmati dengan santai. Salah satu wahana yang menarik adalah menikmati salju dalam ruangan, yakni Snow Play Ground yang berada di area Lagoon. Pengunjung dapat menikmati sensasi dinginnya salju sambil bermain di area tersebut. Tempat ini juga bagus untuk berswafoto. Selain itu, ada dua di antaranya adalah yang pertama di Indonesia, yaitu Jurassic Island dan Pacific Rim.Di Jurassic Island pengunjung akan ditantang melewati terowongan yang dikelilingi oleh dinosaurus hibrida yang jahat. Pengunjung juga akan merasakan sensasi perjalanan Immersive Tunnel Flume pertama di dunia dan satu-satunya di Indonesia yang didatangkan dari Inggris dengan simulator 4D terintegrasi.Sementara di Pacific Rim adalah wahana dark ride 4 dimensi dengan dengan teknologi multisistem canggih yang membuat pengunjung merasakan petualangan di tengah pertempuran hebat. Pengunjung akan diajak menaiki wahana trek dengan panjang lintasan 217 m.Selain itu, Trans Studio Cibubur memiliki banyak wahana dengan pembagian zona. Ada Trans Central Station bernuansa stasiun kereta Eropa zaman dulu. Kawasan ini isinya fasilitas untuk wisatawan yaitu service center, aula, musala, ruang menyusui, klinik, konter foto, toilet yang ramah bagi disabilitas.Bahkan, jika kamu ingin istirahat dan bersantai, bisa banget nongkrong di Beachwalk. Area ini menyediakan restoran seperti Wendy's, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, Studio Bakso, Baskin Robbins, dan Studio Sushi.


Suasana di TSC. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Andry Novelino)

Untuk kamu yang mau pacu adreanlin bisa datang ke beberapa wahana di depan Beachwalk. Ada wahana iFly Skydiving, Zombie Wars, Alien Taxi, Gravitron, Pacific Rim, Spectacular Multimedia Show, Boomerang Coaster, Stunt Show, Science Center, Gravitron, dan Wave Racer. Di zona ini juga tersedia toko suvenir Trans Studio Store dan iFly Store yang menjual berbagai merchandise keren seperti mug, tumblr, mainan, boneka, kaus, dan sebagainya. Kemudian zona yang tak boleh dilewatkan adalah Sci-Fi City. Zona ramah anak ini terdapat Boomerang Coaster dan Science Center yang edukatif yang menampilkan robot, serangga, dan permainan air, sekaligus belajar soal kesiapan tanggap bencana.Terakhir kawasan Adventure Zone. Wahana di sini sangat memanjakan semangat petualangan kamu. Ada Alien Taxi, Bat Glider, Zombie Wars. Di permainan Zombie Wars kamu akan memasuki lorong gelap dan melawan Zombie menyeramkan yang bakal mengejar siapa saja. Seru banget, kan?


Foto: CNN Indonesia

Menariknya, Trans Studio Cibubur memberikan promo khusus Oktober-November 2019 dengan diskon tiket masuk sebesar Rp100 ribu. Jadi untuk masuk ke Trans Studio Cibubur, kamu cukup membayar Rp200 ribu pada Senin-Jumat dan Rp300 ribu pada Sabtu dan Minggu.Bahkan khusus pengguna kartu kredit Bank Mega, ada tawaran tambahan potongan harga sebesar 10 persen yang berlaku sejak 14 Oktober sampai 30 November 2019.Untuk akses lebih mudah dan menghindari antrean, jadwalkan kedatangan dan beli tiket masuk secara online atau daring melalui https://www.transstudiocibubur.com atau melalui aplikasi mobile detikcom.Yuk, segera beli tiketnya dan dapatkan pengalaman seru bermain di pelbagai wahana Trans Studio Cibubur!
text:
Fun Snow Fun Rp. 100,000 Discount at Trans Studio Cibubur
02 Nov 2019, 10:26 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Puput Tripeni Juniman)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Holidays are always the most awaited moment of everyone. For those who are in Jakarta and do not want to go far away to visit a vacation spot, you can come to Trans Studio Cibubur. Trans Studio Cibubur (TSC) presents an international class indoor theme park that is suitable to be a weekend holiday destination that is still in the Jakarta area. Located on Jalan Alternatif Cibubur, Harjamukti, Cimanggis, Depok, Trans Studio Cibubur is open every day starting at 09.00-21.00 WIB . Here a number of rides can be tried with loved ones. There are some exciting and challenging rides, but there are also those that can be enjoyed casually. One interesting vehicle is enjoying indoor snow, the Snow Play Ground in the Lagoon area. Visitors can enjoy the sensation of cold snow while playing in the area. This place is also great for selfies. In addition, there are two of them are the first in Indonesia, namely Jurassic Island and Pacific Rim. On Jurassic Island visitors will be challenged through tunnels surrounded by evil hybrid dinosaurs. Visitors will also feel the sensation of the first Immersive Tunnel Flume trip in the world and the only one in Indonesia imported from the UK with an integrated 4D simulator. While on Pacific Rim is a 4-dimensional dark ride vehicle with advanced multisystem technology that makes visitors experience adventure in the midst of battle great. Visitors will be invited to ride a vehicle with a track length of 217 m. In addition, Trans Studio Cibubur has many rides with zoning. There is a Trans Central Station nuanced the old European train station. This area is filled with facilities for tourists, namely service centers, halls, prayer rooms, nursing rooms, clinics, photo counters, toilets that are friendly for people with disabilities. In fact, if you want to rest and relax, you can really hang out at Beachwalk. This area offers restaurants such as Wendy's, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, Meatball Studio, Baskin Robbins, and Sushi Studio.


The atmosphere at TSC. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Andry Novelino)

For those of you who want to run adreanlin can come to some rides in front of Beachwalk. There are iFly Skydiving rides, Zombie Wars, Alien Taxi, Gravitron, Pacific Rim, Spectacular Multimedia Show, Boomerang Coaster, Stunt Show, Science Center, Gravitron, and Wave Racer. In this zone there is also a Trans Studio Store and iFly Store gift shop that sells a variety of cool merchandise such as mugs, tumblr, toys, dolls, T-shirts, and so on. Then the zone that should not be missed is Sci-Fi City. This kid-friendly zone has an educative Boomerang Coaster and Science Center that features robots, insects, and water games, as well as learning about disaster preparedness. Finally, the Adventure Zone area. The rides here really spoil your spirit of adventure. There are Alien Taxi, Bat Glider, Zombie Wars. In the game Zombie Wars you will enter a dark alley and fight scary Zombies who will chase after anyone. Very exciting, right?


Photo: CNN Indonesia

Interestingly, Trans Studio Cibubur provides a special promo from October to November 2019 with an entrance ticket discount of Rp 100,000. So to get into Trans Studio Cibubur, you only need to pay Rp. 200 thousand on Monday-Friday and Rp. 300 thousand on Saturday and Sunday. Even for Bank Mega credit card users, there is an additional offer of a 10 percent discount which is valid from 14 October to 30 November 2019 . For easier access and avoiding the queue, schedule arrivals and buy tickets online or online through https://www.transstudiocibubur.com or through the detikcom mobile app. Come on, immediately buy tickets and get the exciting experience of playing in various Trans Studio vehicles. Cibubur!
